reviewText: no porn in old movies just lots of fun and great acting a whole series of these movies with bob and bing

I was disappointed in this DVD.  Several of the items were very old, and not good examples of the best Hope/Crosby material.  If you want a complete collection of Hope and Crosby, I guess this DVD might be okay for purchase.  But, if you're looking for good entertainment, consider better alternatives or save your money.

THE ULTIMATE BOB HOPE/BING CROSBY COLLECTION: There's little argument that BOB HOPE and BING CROSBY are one of the most endearing, charismatic, fall-down funny comedy teams of Hollywood's golden era. They did it all...a lotta one liners and slapstick, a little song, a little dance, a little "patty-cake" perchance? Unfortunately, in a flim-flam that would make both legends knowingly point fingers at each other, THE ULTIMATE COLLECTION only contains one "legit" HOPE & CROSBY classic, THE ROAD TO BALI. Even that's in the public domain, so it's turned up endlessly over the years on tape and DVD. The other three selections are not even actual "ROAD" flicks. Two are specials, THE ROAD TO HOLLYWOOD (with CROSBY only) and THE ROAD to LEBANON, a spoof of the ROAD movies starring BING and DANNY THOMAS. The other offering is MY FAVORITE BRUNETTE, a HOPE solo flick which is also in the public domain. A much better bet is THE ROAD SHOW SERIES box set with four classic ROAD pics (to MOROCCO, SINGAPORE, UTOPIA, and ZANZIBAR); this so-called "ULTIMATE" collection is a much bigger joke than ol' "Ski-Nose" or "Der Bingle" ever played on each other.

RATING: TWO FOR THE ROAD
My husband and I loved this video.  It brought back many good memories of watching the shows in the past.  It is something we will enjoy watching over and over again.
